Key Match Events: The game was suspended after 4 pitches in the 1st inning due to persistent rain.
Pre-Game Insights: Chicago is looking to end a four-game winless streak.
The Rangers entered the first game of the three-game series with a two-game losing streak.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be made up on Wednesday as part of a doubleheader, starting at 4:10 p.m.
Others: RHP Jacob deGrom (elbow surgery) retired all six batters he faced in his second rehab start for Triple-A Round Rock on Tuesday night.
RHP Michael Soroka (shoulder strain) and 3B Yoan Moncada (adductor strain) were scheduled to begin rehab assignments with Triple-A Charlotte on Tuesday.
